attributes.action: England should get there own  National anthem as the rest of the Uk
attributes.background:
every country in the uk have they own National anthem so i believe that england should have one too as 
soctland have Flower of scotland
wales have land of my fathers
Irland have londonderry air
so where is england we played land of hope and glory at events so why not make it our national anthem

rejection.details:
The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal or constitutional status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/Symbols/NationalAnthem.aspx
